html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-15752018-12-14,  ,  ,  ,  JUS
ActContraventions Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Application of Provincial Laws Regulations and the Contraventions Regulations (Miscellaneous Program)
PrecisRegulations Amending the APPLICATION OF PROVINCIAL LAWS REGULATIONS AND THE CONTRAVENTIONS REGULATIONS (MISCELLANEOUS PROGRAM) in order to (1) correct a discrepancy between the French and English versions of both the Application of Provincial Laws Regulations and the Contraventions Regulations; (2) harmonize terms used in the regulations with those used in the enabling legislation; (3) add clarity to a regulatory provision; and, (4) reflect the status of the enabling legislation.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0286 Publication Date: 2018-12-26
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Application of Provincial Laws Regulations and the Contraventions Regulations (Miscellaneous Program)
precis: Regulations Amending the APPLICATION OF PROVINCIAL LAWS REGULATIONS AND THE CONTRAVENTIONS REGULATIONS (MISCELLANEOUS PROGRAM) in order to (1) correct a discrepancy between the French and English versions of both the Application of Provincial Laws Regulations and the Contraventions Regulations; (2) harmonize terms used in the regulations with those used in the enabling legislation; (3) add clarity to a regulatory provision; and, (4) reflect the status of the enabling legislation.
